DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect AST-120 PK TRK-100STP , evaluate safety tolerability TRK-100STP alone combination AST-120
DOC.detailed_description: Non-blinded , randomize crossover study evaluate pharmacokinetic interaction TRK-100STP AST-120 different administration condition . Nonelderly adult volunteer receive TRK-100STP without AS-T120 meal . Safety parameter concurrently measure .
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥17.6 ≤26.4 kg/m2 weight ≥50 ≤80 kg Clinical abnormal physical finding , include BP , pulse rate , ECG laboratory assessment Receives investigational medicine within 120 day screen Recent blood donor
